definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至可以数出苏联果园里的果树并分析其产量。

sentences.english: After soil improvement, the yield of this land has increased greatly.
sentences.chinese: 改土后，这块地的产量大幅提升。

sentences.english: At this price, OQ is the maximum quantity that can be sold.
sentences.chinese: 在此价格上，OQ是能够售出的最大产量。

sentences.english: This is the new conveyor belt we had installed last year. We doubled our output in this department as result.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们刚安装的输送带，使我们的产量提高了两倍。

sentences.english: Participate facility and equipment upgrades to improve plant productivity and throughput.
sentences.chinese: 参与升级厂房设施与设备以提高产率产量。

sentences.english: All varieties tested lost yield and value in treatment 5.
sentences.chinese: 处理5所有参试品种的产量和产值均有损失。

sentences.english: Did Bihar really lie about this rice claim?
sentences.chinese: 比哈尔邦是否真的在水稻产量上造假了？

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output was supplied.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了农作物产量的预测预报方程。

sentences.english: Production goes up faster this month.
The study concludes that GM herbicide-resistant soybeans have not increased yields.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究结论，转基因抗除草剂大豆并没有增加产量。

sentences.english: The per unit area yield of ginned cotton has increased by 10% over last year.
sentences.chinese: 皮棉的单位面积产量比去年增加了10%。

sentences.english: A high single plant yield is very important to population's yield in high-Density condition.
sentences.chinese: 在高密度条件下高的单株产量乃是高产的重要前提。

sentences.english: Hay yield is highest from the dough stage to the stage of yellow maturity.
sentences.chinese: 干草产量以蜡熟末至黄熟期为最高。
手扶拖拉机的产量增长了7倍。

sentences.english: So many copies were sold that the factory was producing 320,000 copies of the record every day.
sentences.chinese: 唱片的销路非常好，以致唱片厂的日产量达32万张。

sentences.english: There is a positive correlativity of the content of wet gluten and stable time of dough to the yield.
sentences.chinese: 湿面筋含量和面团稳定时间与强筋小麦产量呈正相关。

definition: to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
property or cash held in reserve/stock
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
